alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:41PM PST until February 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys above 2500 feet. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most likely time for snow showers is for late tonight into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
